snippet: Suicides increased by 45 percent during the first four years of Greece’s financial crisis, a mental health aid group said Tuesday.
abstract: Greek Statistical Authority, governmental health aid group, says that suicides increased by 45 percent during first four years of Greece's financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Suicides increased by 45 percent during the first four years of Greece’s financial crisis, a mental health aid group said Tuesday.

headline.main: Greece: Suicide Has Soared During Crisis, Aid Group Says
headline.print_headline: Greece: Suicide Has Soared During Crisis, Aid Group Says
